title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Powering your success through AWS Infrastructure innovations (NET402)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 AWS 基础设施创新助力您的成功 (NET402)
abstract: Discover how AWS Networking delivers on five critical outcomes: availability, performance, scalability, agility, and cost. Come and learn about continual infrastructure advancements in datacenter technologies, and how we integrate lessons from our GenAI scaling journey. As one of the world's top network device makers, we've applied these innovations to make all workloads - including AI/ML - faster and more reliable. In this session, you will learn how the AWS backbone is more reliable from transformative cloud infrastructure innovations, giving your workloads competitive advantages in today's evolving technological landscape.
abstract_cn: 了解 AWS 网络如何实现五个关键成果：可用性、性能、可扩展性、敏捷性和成本。来了解数据中心技术的持续基础设施进步，以及我们如何整合从生成式 AI 扩展之旅中获得的经验教训。作为全球顶级网络设备制造商之一，我们已将这些创新应用于使所有工作负载（包括 AI/ML）更快、更可靠。在本次会议中，您将了解 AWS 骨干网如何通过变革性云基础设施创新变得更加可靠，为您的工作负载在当今不断发展的技术环境中提供竞争优势。
